original_text: therefore prophesy, and say, Thus says the Lord God: Precisely because they made you desolate and crushed you from all sides, so that you became the possession of the rest of the nations, and you became the talk and evil gossip of the people,
korean_text: 그러므로 너는 예언하여 이르기를 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시기를 그들이 너희를 황폐하게 하고 너희 사방을 삼켜 너희가 남은 이방인의 기업이 되게 하여 사람의 말 거리와 백성의 비방 거리가 되게 하였도다

sentences.original_text: Precisely because they made you desolate
and crushed you from all sides,
so that you became the possession of the rest of the nations,
and you became the talk and evil gossip of the people,
